suggestedTasks.title: Add User Interaction Tests for SessionCard Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive interaction tests for the SessionCard component to verify Send button functionality and input validation. Focus on testing different user input scenarios, button states, and ensuring proper event handling. These tests should cover edge cases like empty input, input with whitespace, and sequential input submissions.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered lack of interaction testing during bug resolution

suggestedTasks.title: Document SessionCard Input Interaction Patterns
suggestedTasks.description: Update component documentation to clearly specify expected user interaction flows for the SessionCard. Include details about Send button behavior, input validation rules, and any specific interaction guidelines. This documentation should help future developers understand the intended user experience and component design.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified need for clearer interaction specifications

patterns: Always include explicit Send button for text input interfaces
gotchas: Missing interaction controls can block user experience
